citation: Harvard Summer School Conference on the Contemporary Novel. August 3â€“5, 1953. Woodberry Poetry Room, Houghton Library, Harvard University.
label: August 5, 1953 Afternoon

children.text: In the Forum Room on August 5th, the last afternoon of the conference, Hans Egon Holthusen gives a lecture in response to the talks and discussions from the evening before. This program also includes a session discussion.
